caption: Welcome to the 2025 NRL Telstra Premiership Finals Series üèÜ Time to get to business.

LOCKED IN üîí 

The top 8 teams have been decided ahead of the 2025 NRL Finals series!

ROAD TO THE GF üèÜ

Match-ups have been locked in for Week 1 of the 2025 NRL Finals series!

Nicho Hynes is free to play in Saturday's elimination final after his Dangerous Contact charge was downgraded by the Match Review Committee.
 
Hynes was initially facing a one-match ban for a hip drop tackle on Marcelo Montoya, who left the field with an ankle injury.
 
The MRC remains satisfied that there is sufficient evidence for a Dangerous Contact charge but has downgraded the offence from Grade 2 to Grade 1 following a new medical report showing Montoya's injury is less serious than initially thought.
After 27 epic rounds, it all comes down to this. One play can define a season. These are the moments that matter. It all begins this weekend ü•Å
